pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, June 18, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will address Canadians on the COVID-19 situation. A media availability will follow.

Rideau Cottage
1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Pool coverage
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions to the Prime Minister.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-960-7518
    Toll-free: 1-866-805-7923
    Pass code: 6822783#

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will virtually meet with students from Nelson Mandela High School, located in Calgary, Alberta.

Closed to media.

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will virtually participate in a fireside chat with Teresa Woo-Paw during the 2021 Chinese Canadian Leaders’ Summit, organized by the Action, Chinese Canadians Together (ACCT) Foundation.

Closed to media.
